answers.label: Did this business make major changes in the following areas?

options.label: New business practices for organising procedures
options.value: New business practices for organising procedures
options.description: For example supply chain management, business re-engineering, knowledge management, lean production, quality management

options.label: New methods of organising work responsibilities and decision making
options.value: New methods of organising work responsibilities and decision making
options.description: For example first use of a new system of employee responsibilities, team work, decentralisation, integration or de-integration of departments, education / training systems

options.label: New methods of organising external relationships with other firms or public institutions
options.value: New methods of organising external relationships with other firms or public institutions
options.description: For example first use of alliances, partnerships, outsourcing or sub-contracting

options.label: Implementation of changes to marketing concepts or strategies
options.value: Implementation of changes to marketing concepts or strategies
